description:
◆ENigmatic Recollection Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OnMxjFRlywA

◆Chapter 1 Theme Song "START AGAIN" MV: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r-kkCrVZUzc

◆What is "ENigmatic Recollection"?
It is a collection of stories in which the members of hololive English play a part.
Through streams, animations, and songs wrought anew, immerse yourself in fresh narratives woven from myriad realms beyond.

—---

This game is being streamed and monetized after confirming with Mojang based on the following Terms and Conditions (https://account.mojang.com/terms)
